Text:
hi malestrom,

thanks for this.  anyway what software can open this type of file DJVU...

Looks very interesting. Unfortunately my ebook reader can't open DJVU.

So far I've not been able to find a reliable converter to PDF.  :-(

Download the application from here

http://www.convertdjvutopdf.com/

Install and after selecting the djvu file,select "export as" and save it as a pdf. I tested it and it works. :)

Would you by any chance be able to find the Wiley Encyclopedia of Physics?

http://www.amazon.com/Encyclopedia-Physics-Rita-G-Lerner/dp/3527405542

Thanks for all your great work.

Thanks for pointing me to the converter, it does work. The files get a lot larger, but that's OK.

These books are old (1956?) but they are a very interesting read. I've only browsed them so far, of course. Wouldn't mind having the paper version for my bookcase either!

Anyway, thanks for being you, Malestrom! ;-)
